sentences.en: A zinc coating is applied to the steel for rust protection.
sentences.cn: 镀锌层是用来防止钢铁生锈的.

sentences.en: Abstr: In zinc extraction process, fluorine and chlorine, leached into the solution, affect the normal operation of electrolysis.
sentences.cn: 文章摘要： 湿法锌冶炼中，随浸出进入系统的氟、氯离子影响电解的正常进行。

sentences.en: Brass is an alloy of copper and zinc.
Brass is formed by the fusion of copper and zinc.
sentences.cn: 黄铜是通过铜和锌的熔合而成的.

sentences.en: Combinations of zinc salts and creosote have also been widely employed.
sentences.cn: 锌盐和防腐油的混合物也已广泛地被采用.

sentences.en: Copper and zinc are fused to make brass.
sentences.cn: 铜与锌熔合后形成黄铜。

sentences.en: He was involved in oil, zinc and lead prospecting.
sentences.cn: 他参与了石油、锌和铅的勘探。

sentences.en: His body is in short of zinc.
Hydrogen is a product of the reaction between zinc and sulphuric acid.
sentences.cn: 氢是锌和硫酸反应的生成物.

sentences.en: One medium oyster provides nearly all of the zinc you need for a day.
sentences.cn: 一个中等大小的牡蛎几乎可以提供给你一天所需的所有锌。

sentences.en: Some microbes like nothing better than to be nestled in a toxic sludge of heavy metals like zinc, arsenic and cadmium.
sentences.cn: 对于一些微生物而言，没有什么比生活在充满了锌、砷和镉之类的重金属的有毒淤泥中更加惬意的。

sentences.en: The extinct exotic bird's feather contains zinc.
sentences.cn: 那种已绝迹的珍奇的鸟的羽毛中含锌。

sentences.en: The fusion of copper and zinc makes the metal brass.
sentences.cn: 铜和锌的熔化制成黄铜.

sentences.en: the fusion of copper and zinc to produce brass
Zinc base die castings are always copper plated in cyanide baths.
sentences.cn: 锌基合金的压铸件总是在氰化镀液中镀铜.

sentences.en: Zinc can be used to cover other metals to stop them rusting.
sentences.cn: 锌可用来涂在其他金属表面以防锈.

sentences.en: Zinc displaces the hydrogen of dilute acids.
Zinc is used to protect other metals from corrosion.
sentences.cn: 锌被用来保护其他金属不受腐蚀。

trans.tran_en: a blue-white metal that is used to make brass and to cover and protect objects made of iron. It is a chemical element: symbol Zn
